page.title: 04The Farm
page.content: The farm was in existance from about the 12th century.The house is more modern.It has 11 rooms. They have got 6 trailers and 5 tractors.A tractor costs about Â£15,000.The tractors have to have safety guards in case of accidents. They have had 30 beef cattle sold for slaughter this year.It takes half an hour to feed the animals.They have got pigs chickens, horses, cows, dogs and cats. They have 170 acres of land.The main crops are grass and cereal.The farm is self supporting, selling its own produce and making a profit. It is a family business.Mr.Wyatt was born on the farm.His alarm is set for half seven.They do not have very many visitors,but a few people keep their horses on the farm and go riding in the evenings and at weekends.
